description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，中国的经济、金融、贸易、航运、商业、上游制造和对外开放中心。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China, and the country's center for economy, finance, trade, shipping, commerce, upstream manufacturing, and opening up.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，是世界上人口第二多的国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, it is the world's second-most populous country.

description.zh-cn: 1990年起由中国中央政府推动的针对上海浦东地区的经济发展政策，极大地促进了上海的经济增长。
description.en: An economic development policy for the Pudong area of Shanghai initiated by the Chinese central government in 1990, which significantly boosted Shanghai's economic growth.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、上海市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任上海市市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任上海市人大常委会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任上海市政协主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Chairman of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在第一次鸦片战争中战败后与英国签订的不平等条约，导致上海等五个港口被迫开放。
description.en: An unequal treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and the United Kingdom after the First Opium War, which led to the forced opening of five ports, including Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京条约》，上海于1843年正式对外开放，成为通商口岸，开启了其近代化进程。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Nanking, Shanghai was officially opened to foreign trade in 1843, becoming a treaty port and beginning its process of modernization.

description.zh-cn: 近代中国历史上在上海存在的一个外国租界，拥有独立的司法和行政权力。
description.en: A foreign concession in Shanghai during modern Chinese history, which possessed independent judicial and administrative powers.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲的岛国，在近代与清朝签订《南京条约》，并在上海设立租界。
description.en: An island country in Europe that signed the Treaty of Nanking with the Qing dynasty and established a concession in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 近代中国历史上法国在上海的租界。
description.en: The French concession in Shanghai during modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 西欧国家，曾在上海设立租界。
description.en: A country in Western Europe that established a concession in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争中的一场重要战役，发生于上海。战后上海沦陷。
description.en: A major battle of the Second Sino-Japanese War that took place in Shanghai. After the battle, Shanghai fell to Japanese forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的上海市行政建制。
description.en: The administrative establishment of Shanghai City during the Republic of China period.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战末期的一场战役，战后中国人民解放军控制上海全境。
description.en: A campaign in the late stage of the Chinese Civil War, which resulted in the Chinese People's Liberation Army taking control of the entire Shanghai area.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1950年中华民国空军对上海进行的一次大规模空袭，造成严重人员伤亡和财产损失。
description.en: A large-scale air raid on Shanghai conducted by the Republic of China Air Force in 1950, causing severe casualties and property damage.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的空军部队。
description.en: The aerial warfare branch of the Republic of China Armed Forces.

nodes.id: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

zh-cn: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆境内第一个自由贸易区，位于上海。
description.en: The first free-trade zone in mainland China, located in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

zh-cn: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

description.zh-cn: 2022年春季在上海爆发的大规模新冠病毒感染事件，导致了长达两个月的封城措施。
description.en: A large-scale COVID-19 outbreak in Shanghai in the spring of 2022, which led to a two-month-long citywide lockdown.

description.zh-cn: 2022年底在中国多地发生的针对清零政策的抗议活动。
description.en: Protests against the zero-COVID policy that occurred in multiple locations across China in late 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史最长、规模最大的美术电影制片基地之一，创作了《大闹天宫》等大量经典动画作品。
description.en: One of China's oldest and largest animation film studios, known for producing numerous classic animated works such as 'Havoc in Heaven'.

description.zh-cn: 上海美术电影制片厂制作的彩色动画长片，是中国动画史上的里程碑式作品。
description.en: A color animated feature film produced by the Shanghai Animation Film Studio, a milestone work in the history of Chinese animation.

description.zh-cn: 形成于20世纪上海的一种文化现象和风格，特点是融合了江南传统文化和西方近代文化。
description.en: A cultural phenomenon and style that formed in 20th-century Shanghai, characterized by the fusion of traditional Jiangnan culture and modern Western culture.

description.zh-cn: 指代中国长江三角洲地区具有鲜明特征的地域文化，是海派文化的重要根基。
description.en: Refers to the distinctive regional culture of the Yangtze River Delta region in China, serving as a significant foundation for the Shanghai School culture.

description.zh-cn: 1990年4月，中共中央和国务院作出开发开放上海浦东的决定，推动了上海经济的快速发展。
description.en: In April 1990, the CPC Central Committee and the State Council decided to develop and open up Pudong, Shanghai, which promoted the rapid economic development of the city.

description.zh-cn: 浦东的开发开放政策使得上海经济获得快速发展，再度巩固了其作为中国经济、金融及贸易中心的地位。
description.en: The development and opening-up policy of Pudong enabled Shanghai's economy to achieve rapid growth, once again solidifying its status as China's economic, financial, and trade center.

description.zh-cn: 根据1842年签订的《南京条约》，上海作为通商五口之一于1843年正式开埠。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Nanking signed in 1842, Shanghai was officially opened as one of the five treaty ports in 1843.

description.zh-cn: 1845年，清朝与英国签订《上海租地章程》，由此开始设立租界。
description.en: In 1845, the Qing government and Great Britain signed the Shanghai Land Regulations, which initiated the establishment of the concession.

description.zh-cn: 法国于1849年在上海设立租界。
description.en: France established its concession in Shanghai in 1849.

description.zh-cn: 淞沪会战历时三个月，最终导致上海沦陷。
description.en: The Battle of Shanghai lasted for three months and ultimately led to the fall of the city.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军于1949年5月发动上海战役，并于5月27日控制上海全境。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched the Shanghai Campaign in May 1949 and took full control of the city on May 27.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国空军于1950年2月6日对上海市进行了大规模轰炸。
description.en: The Republic of China Air Force conducted a large-scale bombing of Shanghai on February 6, 1950.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

description.zh-cn: 2013年8月，国务院正式批准设立中国（上海）自由贸易试验区。
description.en: In August 2013, the State Council officially approved the establishment of the China (Shanghai) Pilot Free-Trade Zone.

relationships.target: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记习近平支持设立上海自由贸易区项目。
description.en: Then-General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Xi Jinping supported the project to establish the Shanghai Free-Trade Zone.

relationships.target: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理李克强支持设立上海自由贸易区项目。
description.en: Then-Premier of the State Council Li Keqiang supported the project to establish the Shanghai Free-Trade Zone.

relationships.source: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

description.zh-cn: 上海因疫情执行的严格清零政策引发了民众抗议，成为白纸运动的一部分。
description.en: The strict zero-COVID policy implemented in Shanghai due to the outbreak triggered public protests, becoming part of the White Paper protests.

description.zh-cn: 海派文化根植于江南地区传统的吴越文化。
description.en: The Shanghai School culture is rooted in the traditional Wuyue culture of the Jiangnan region.

description.zh-cn: 上海美术电影制片厂创作并出品了动画长片《大闹天宫》。
description.en: The Shanghai Animation Film Studio created and produced the animated feature film 'Havoc in Heaven'.

position.en: Secretary of the Municipal Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁自2022年10月起担任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chen Jining has served as the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee since October 2022.

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁是中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chen Jining is a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 龚正自2020年3月起担任上海市市长。
description.en: Gong Zheng has served as the Mayor of Shanghai since March 2020.

position.en: Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 黄莉新自2024年1月起担任上海市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Huang Lixin has served as the Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress since January 2024.

position.en: Chairman of the CPPCC Municipal Committee

description.zh-cn: 胡文容自2023年1月起担任上海市政协主席。
description.en: Hu Wenrong has served as the Chairman of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPPCC since January 2023.
